ingredients.ingredient: 1 (19 ounce) can creamy potato with roasted garlic soup
2 ½ cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided

cookingTips: Slice potatoes thinly and evenly using a mandoline for consistent cooking and appealing presentation
Layer potatoes and sauce alternately, ending with cheese on top for a golden crust
Cover dish with foil initially to prevent over-browning, then uncover to finish cooking and golden
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why is layering technique important in scalloped potatoes, and how does it affect the final texture?
